p: The present study clarified the mechanism of daidzein-induced inhibition of influenza virus replication. Daidzein showed no antioxidant activity under our experimental conditions (Fig. 2A–F); however, it enhanced 5-HETE production (Fig. 2F). Based on the effects of zileuton, a direct inhibitor of 5-LOX (Fig. 4A and B), and knockdown of 5-LOX (Fig. 4D), we observed that 5-LOX is involved in daidzein-induced 5-HETE production and daidzein-induced anti-influenza activity. Additionally, 5-HpETE, the primary product of 5-LOX, inhibited influenza virus replication (Fig. 5A).
